name: Chicken Basquaise
ingredients: chicken thighs, bell peppers, tomatoes, onions, garlic, paprika, white wine, chicken broth, olive oil, salt, pepper
quantities: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 2 bell peppers, 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 1 large onion, 3 cloves garlic, 2 tsp paprika, 1 cup white wine, 1 cup chicken broth, 2 tbsp olive oil, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Brown 2 lbs chicken thighs in 2 tbsp olive oil. Remove and set aside.
2. Saut√© 1 large chopped onion, 2 sliced bell peppers, and 3 minced garlic cloves until soft.
3. Add 2 tsp paprika and cook for 1-2 minutes.
4. Add 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 1 cup white wine, and 1 cup chicken broth. Return chicken to the pan.
5. Simmer until chicken is cooked through.
6. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.
